website_summaries.verdict: The Nike KD Trey 5 V is considered one of the lightest basketball shoe models by most reviewers. It is a solid performer with amazing ventilation, good traction, and is true to size. The shoe is fit for guard positions because of the Zoom technology in the forefoot.If you are a guard and you want a budget-friendly pair that can provide lightness, speed and a awesome court feel, the KD Trey 5 V is the one for you.
pros: The wavy herringbone traction of the Nike KD Trey 5 V may have worked because a good number of reviewers say that the shoe has a great court grip
This type of pattern has proven its grip time and time again, even on 2018 basketball models like the tenth Hyperdunk from Nike
A good number of buyers say that the shoe is true to size just like the 12th KD from Nike
The mesh upper of the shoe model is liked by a huge number of wearers because it is comfortable and breathable
Wearers have a similar experience with the UA HOVR Havoc
A lot of users appreciate the thick laces on the lateral side of the shoe because it provides more lockdown
Many purchasers thank the ample amount of comfort provided by the thick padding in the collar of the shoe
A huge number of users appreciate the outrigger on the midsole because it helps them prevent ankle injuries
A good number of reviewers say that the internal heel counter of the shoe prevents foot slippage well
According to most testers, the combination of Phylon and minimal Zoom technology in the midsole great for guard positions
cons: There are a few users who mention that the shoe runs long
Some purchasers comment that the shoe does not deliver impact protection because their legs have become sore after playing
A couple of wearers comment that the upper of the shoe rips after just a few months of use
According to a small number of buyers, the shoe takes a lot of time to break in

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've only played in these once, but I have to say I was really pleased with them out of the box. They're light, have great grip, a nice tight fit and solid impact cushioning. They do run a bit narrow, and I have a pretty wide foot. They aren't too narrow, fit snug. They are also maybe 1/8" longer in the toe. They locked the heel in so well, that I didn't experience any sliding so a little extra room in the toe was actually nice, but might take a little getting used to. So far, very please with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Anderson

customer_reviews.title: another fine shoe
customer_reviews.text: It’s just another quality product by the manufacturer. I like the synthetic over lay better than the old fashioned leather. Just one thing that the new designs by nearly all brand manufacturers tend to designe the models somewhat tight , i’m Not saying it will not fit , but you feel it tight specially with thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Limited Ankle Support
customer_reviews.text: I have a terrible habit of rolling my ankles on jump ball or pretty much any scenario possible. this shoe does not provide much ankle support. I will say for the price point it's still a great deal and they're very comfortable shoes and they look sharp. I turned these into a casual going out shoe for running errands etc..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buying used/new with all Amazon’s backing is a smart move!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my grandson, & the available size was a whole size larger. He is growing so fast it isn’t an issue. He was/ is so excited he wears them with pride everywhere (except fishing). First time purchasing used footwear & honestly it didn’t appear worn even once!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feel like Marty McFly every time I wear them
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Get compliments every time I wear them. They do fit on the snug side. Probably would buy a half size extra next time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: WTH!
customer_reviews.text: The description said 12 women's/ 9.5 men's.....These were the only shoes my 12 yo wanted after looking for weeks. They just arrived and I was sent a 12 in men's!!!! His first basketball game is tomorrow..... Thank for ruining yet another event for us AMAZON!!! I didn't learn last time but this is the last time!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Garza

customer_reviews.title: Only athletic shoes I buy anymore
customer_reviews.text: 3rd pair of these shoes. Only shoes I buy anymore, comfort,durability, style.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fit great
customer_reviews.text: I love how they fit great work out shoe the only thing they came a little scuffed
customer_reviews.author: Roberto orozco

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great and they fit they are the exact size that they should be
customer_reviews.author: reonard

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. They have pretty good ankle support as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes. 18 basketball games in 3 days and going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Cort

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. Have had a few pair and they are hard to find in store. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Geronki Coble

customer_reviews.title: KD V
customer_reviews.text: Good grip and light weight. I'm still not getting buckets like KD but it's not the shoes fault
customer_reviews.author: Willie Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Worn only inside 1/2 of basketball season and this is what happened. Poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Great Basketball Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Fits well and looks great too! Well worth the price for the quality of the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Kyle H.

customer_reviews.title: Worst condition ever
customer_reviews.text: When I open the box the shoes were all bent up and creased up like somebody had already warned them I was very disappointed and still am
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Worthy of Durant's Name
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are of exceptional quality. They feel narrow at first but after breaking them in they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with fit, support and weight. Seem to be durable so far.
customer_reviews.author: John Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 9.5 just to they could last, but they seem like a 9. That's ok though, I love the product and they are amazing on the court like they were made for!
customer_reviews.author: NASCAR58_E

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love this Nike shoe one of the most comfortable shoes just get a half size bigger so comfortable I have 4 pairs
customer_reviews.author: dandre  livingston

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit true to size and fit my brother great!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

product_meta.title: Nike Women's Tennis Shoes
product_meta.description: Versatility is important on the court. From your game to your shoes, you need to be prepared for any situation. The Nike KD Trey 5 V Basketball Shoes will keep you ready for whatever the game may bring..
feature_bullets: Forefoot Zoom Air unit delivers responsive cushioning.
Dynamic lacing system offers adaptive midfoot containment.
Articulated rubber outsole provides durable, flexible traction.
